first-pharmacy: The First Pharmacy In SYRIA ever
our-services-text: From pharmacies to healthcare e-commerce, loyalty programmes, home delivery services & more supporting a seamless health journey, making millions of lives better.
our-network-title: Leading Pharmacy Chain In The GCC
our-network-text: Moafa Pharmacy, a division of Moafa DM Healthcare is backed by more than two decades of experience in pharmaceutical retailing. Recognized today as the region’s leading pharmacy retail chain, Moafa Pharmacy focuses on“delivering good health & happiness” through friendly neighborhood pharmacies that are customer-centric & easily accessible.
product-categories-title: The Best Care, Every Step Of The Way
product-categories-text: Offering an entire gamut of curative, nutritive, baby care, lifestyle, wellness, fitness, beauty, personal care, homecare products & more coupled with caring & professional health advisory - Aster Pharmacy is a household name & a brand of choice in the UAE.
our-products-text: Our Moafa products has Most Product Deals with every customer across SYRIA
